sect2.title: Contents
sect2.para: The Inetutils package contains network clients and servers.

sect3.title: ftp
sect3.para: ftp is a ARPANET file transfer client.

sect3.title: logger
sect3.para: logger make entries in the system log.

sect3.title: ping
sect3.para: ping sends ICMP ECHO_REQUEST packets to network hosts.

sect3.title: rcp
sect3.para: rcp is a remote file copy client.

sect3.title: rlogin
sect3.para: rlogin is a remote login client.

sect3.title: rsh
sect3.para: rsh is a remote shell client.

sect3.title: syslogd
sect3.para: syslogd logs systems messages.

sect3.title: talk
sect3.para: talk allows communication between users.

sect3.title: telnet
sect3.para: telnet is a user interface to the TELNET protocol.

sect3.title: tftp
sect3.para: tftp is an Internet Trivial File Transfer Protocol client.

sect3.title: whois
sect3.para: whois is a client for the whois directory service.

sect3.title: ftpd
sect3.para: ftpd is a DARPA Internet File Transfer Protocol server.

sect3.title: inetd
sect3.para: inetd is a Internet super-server.

sect3.title: rexecd
sect3.para: rexcd is a remote execution server.

sect3.title: rlogind
sect3.para: rlogind is a remote login server.

sect3.title: rshd
sect3.para: rshd is a remote shell server.

sect3.title: talkd
sect3.para: talkd is a remote user communication server.

sect3.title: telnetd
sect3.para: telnetd is a DARPA TELNET protocol server.

sect3.title: tftpd
sect3.para: tftpd is an Internet Trivial File Transfer Protocol server.

sect3.title: uucpd
sect3.para: uucpd is the server for supporting UUCP connections over networks.
